title: The Power & Intelligence of Karma & Reincarnation
description: Karma and Reincarnation has been much misunderstood - this book attempts to change the paradigm. For so long since life is so harsh, we have views life as bad and hope to run away to magic lands in the sky. This book asks us to take a different view of life - Life is Gift and Reincarnation gives us this Gift over and over! Karma is not a metaphysical or spiritual payback system - the word comes from Sanskrit which means "Work" or "Action" - that's it.
author: S. Dharma
